name: Trade Off
description:
Trade Off is a vertical slice / prototype of a 3D puzzle platformer game made in UE4. The player has the ability to swap between 3 characters each with their own unique ability. Reach the end of the level to complete the game.

How to Play

During the game, the player will be able to swap between 3 different characters:

  • Green - Fires projectiles that can destroy targets
  • Red - Slow and cannot jump, however, will bounce if landing
  • Blue - Small and fast with the ability to dash midair

If playing on easy, checkpoints can be activated by standing above them, otherwise, the player must collect and use tokens in order to activate a checkpoint.

Controls

The game features KBM and Gamepad support.

Credits

Developed by Raven Powless

Small Character - PO-Art

Gameplay Theme - rezoner (CC-BY 3.0)

Menu Themes - The Cynic Project

Ending Particle Effect - Max Q
